subject: EARTH
title: Radioactive Isotope Systems
description: Principles of radioactive decay and geochronology.  Applications of geochronology and isotopic tracing using the U-Th-Pb, Re-OS, Lu-Hf, Sm-Nd, Rb-Sr, and Ar-Ar Isotope systems, U-series disequilibrum, cosmogenic nuclides, and extinct radionuclides.  Offered in alternate years.
